caption.p: Phylogenetic tree based on partial capsid region (ORF2) of NoV strains. Sequences from sporadic acute gastroenteritis patients in Shanghai, 2014–2016 are shown with black triangles, time and Genbank accession numbers in the phylogenetic trees. Reference sequences, obtained from GenBank, display in the phylogenetic trees with black square, time, genotype, city or country, and accession number
